fields_of_interest: Budget, Employment and Social Affairs, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: EU Justice and Home Affairs, including children's rights and child protection
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
CHILD CIRCLE is a Brussels based non-profit organisation which promotes and supports the strengthening of child protection systems in Europe.  
 
CHILD CIRCLE promotes European action which strengthens national systems to protect children from violence, abuse, neglect and exploitation. ​ 
 
​We advocate for European action which enhances child participation and the ways in which professionals work together to protect children.  
 
CHILD CIRCLE contributes to policy and law developments at EU level, connects child protection advocates through a knowledge exchange and collaborates with stakeholders on practical projects.
relevant_communication:
EU project on unaccompanied minors that go missing (SUMMIT) 
EU project on separated children with AIRE Centre 
EU project on protecting child victims of violence with CBSS (Promise and Promise II) 
EU Project on child friendly justice for child suspects with DCI 
 
Information and publications can be found www.childcircle.eu
